translations: n.[脊椎] 水鹿；[脊椎] 黑鹿（东南亚产的一种大鹿）

phrs.translation: 水鹿, 黑鹿, 南印酸豆汤, 东南亚产的一种大鹿

sentences.sentence: Sambar is its milder cousin, made of lentils and vegetables, usually served with rice.
sentences.translation: 水鹿是其较温和的表姐，制成的小扁豆和蔬菜，通常是服务与水稻。

sentences.sentence: “Everyone gave money to the Liberation Tigers, ” says a 30-year-old waiter in Sambar, a Sri Lankan café in Harrow. “And we lost everything.”
sentences.translation: 在哈罗的一家名叫Sambar的斯里兰卡咖啡店内，一个30岁的男服务员说：“每个人都给钱给猛虎解放组织，并且我们失去了一切。”

sentences.sentence: The staple diet of most Indians consist of dal/sambar, rice, chapatis/rotis with cooked vegetables (mildly spiced/stir fried) or fish/meat.
sentences.translation: 印度人的主食包括南印度酸豆汤、米饭、印度烙饼、（适当调味或煸炒的）蔬菜以及鱼和肉。
